es.plan1_back: ¬øSientes que tu celular o computadora est√° actuando raro? Si crees que alguien puede estar espi√°ndote, este plan revisa tus dispositivos como si fueran una escena del crimen digital. Detectamos cualquier rastro sospechoso y te entregamos pruebas claras. Ideal para quienes buscan tranquilidad, pruebas concretas y soluciones reales.
es.plan2_back: ¬øAlguien te contact√≥ de forma sospechosa? ¬øDudas de la identidad o intenciones de una persona online? Este plan te ayuda a descubrir qui√©n est√° realmente detr√°s. Usamos informaci√≥n p√∫blica avanzada para ayudarte a confirmar identidades y encontrar datos clave que te ayuden a decidir qu√© hacer. Sin tecnicismos, solo respuestas.
es.plan3_back: Si lo que necesitas es una visi√≥n completa de una persona o entidad, este plan es ideal. Rastreamos sus pasos en internet, analizamos sus redes y creamos un perfil detallado de su comportamiento. Es perfecto si est√°s lidiando con riesgos, sospechas graves o tomas decisiones importantes y necesitas un respaldo real.
es.plan4_back: Este plan est√° hecho para empresas que no pueden dejar la seguridad al azar. Si gestionas una marca, lideras una operaci√≥n o te importa la protecci√≥n de tu reputaci√≥n digital, aqu√≠ analizamos riesgos, detectamos amenazas y te damos un mapa claro del entorno. No solo resolvemos problemas, te damos ventaja estrat√©gica.

es.testimonio_1: Durante una operaci√≥n de rastreo, el sujeto generalmente se mueve, y su ubicaci√≥n puede cambiar en pocas horas tras el reporte inicial del an√°lisis.

es.section1_1_text: Al acceder y utilizar este sitio web, aceptas cumplir con estos t√©rminos y condiciones. Si no est√°s de acuerdo con alguno de estos t√©rminos, te recomendamos que no utilices nuestros servicios.

Esto significa que el cliente debe ser el titular de los derechos o tener la autorizaci√≥n necesaria para realizar la investigaci√≥n solicitada. CyberSecureAID no asume ninguna responsabilidad por las consecuencias legales que puedan derivarse del uso indebido de nuestros servicios. Es responsabilidad del cliente asegurarse de que su solicitud cumpla con todas las leyes aplicables y que tenga la debida autorizaci√≥n para llevar a cabo la investigaci√≥n.
es.section2_2_text: CyberSecureAID no ser√° responsable por cualquier da√±o directo, indirecto, incidental o consecuente que resulte del uso o la incapacidad para usar nuestros servicios, incluso si se nos ha informado sobre la posibilidad de tales da√±os.
es.section3_text: ‚ÄúCyberSecureAID no realiza intervenciones ilegales, hackeo no autorizado ni acciones que infrinjan leyes de privacidad digital. Todos los servicios se realizan sobre fuentes abiertas, dispositivos propios o bajo autorizaci√≥n escrita del interesado.‚Äù
es.section4_1_text: Todo el contenido de este sitio web, incluyendo textos, gr√°ficos, logotipos y software, es propiedad de CyberSecureAID o de sus licenciantes y est√° protegido por las leyes de derechos de autor.

us.Servicios Profesionales de Investigaci√≥: Professional Digital Investigation and Cybersecurity Services
us.plan1_alert:
To carry out this audit, we recommend providing:

‚Ä¢ Suspicious files (documents, images, apps).
‚Ä¢ Screenshots or relevant activity logs.
‚Ä¢ Profiles, IP addresses, or involved devices.
‚Ä¢ A detailed description of the incident or suspicion.
‚Ä¢ Any additional data that helps contextualize the investigation.

üõà Note: If not all information is provided, we will still conduct the analysis, though results may be less complete.
us.plan1_feature1: Structural and integrity analysis of mobile devices confiscated or available
us.plan1_feature2: Technical examination for detection of security operational anomalies
us.plan1_feature3: Comprehensive review of digital security configurations and protocols
us.plan1_feature4: Forensic scan for identification of malicious software patterns

us.plan1_feature9: Technical opinion documented for internal processes

us.plan2_feature1: Advanced exploration of open sources to collect useful digital traces
us.plan2_feature2: Contextual extraction of digital metadata from files, images, and links

us.plan2_feature4: Specialized search on relevant public social profiles
us.plan2_feature6: Digitalized report with executive summary in PDF format

us.plan3_feature2: Cross-referenced analysis of open databases and digital historical files

us.plan4_feature2: Automated segmentation of digital traces from social networks, collaboration platforms, and public media

us.plan4_feature4: Probabilistic device detection through digital fingerprinting and cross-referenced technical identities
us.plan4_feature5: Advanced graphical representation of heat maps and temporal behavior lines
us.plan4_feature6: Adaptive risk detection algorithm with automated alerts for critical events
us.plan4_feature7: Executive-level report + technical report with methodological support

us.plan1_back: Do you feel like your phone or computer is acting strange? If you think someone might be spying on you, this plan examines your devices as if they were a digital crime scene. We detect any suspicious traces and provide you with clear evidence. Ideal for those seeking peace of mind, concrete proof, and real solutions.
us.plan2_back: Do you ever receive a suspicious message or email? Do you have doubts about the identity or intentions of an online person? This plan helps you discover who is behind it. We use advanced public information to help you confirm identities and find key data that helps you make a decision. Without technical tricks, just answers.
us.plan3_back: If you need a complete view of a person or entity, this plan is ideal. We stream their steps online, analyze their networks, and create a detailed profile of their behavior. It's perfect if you're working with risks, grave suspicions, or making important decisions and need real support.
us.plan4_back: This plan is made for companies that cannot let the randomness go. If you manage a brand, lead an operation, or are important to your digital reputation, here we analyze risks, detect threats, and give you a clear picture of the environment. Not only solve problems, but you get strategic advantage.
us.confidentiality_desc: Maximum security and discretion in all our investigation processes
us.technology_desc: State-of-the-art algorithms for precise and detailed analysis
us.accuracy_desc: Verified, high-quality results backed by experts
us.delivery_desc: Optimized response times without compromising analysis quality
us.support_desc: Expert guidance throughout the investigation process
us.analysis_desc: Complete coverage of digital sources and specialized forensic analysis
us.testimonio_1: During a tracking operation, the subject generally moves, and their location may change within hours of the initial analysis report.
us.testimonio_2: It's important to note that time is essential; a quick response can make a difference in the effectiveness of tracking and forensic analysis.
us.section1_1_text: By accessing and using this website, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. If you are not in agreement with any of these terms, we recommend that you do not use our services.
us.section2_1_text: The customer must have legal authority to request investigation. This means that the customer must be the owner of the rights or have the necessary authorization to perform the requested investigation. CyberSecureAID does not assume any liability for legal consequences that may arise from the use of our services in an unlawful manner. It is the responsibility of the customer to ensure that their request complies with all applicable laws and has the appropriate authorization to carry out the investigation.
us.section2_2_text: CyberSecureAID will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damage that results from the use or inability to use our services, even if we have been notified of the possibility of such damages.
us.section3_text: ‚ÄúCyberSecureAID does not carry out illegal interventions, unauthorized hacking or actions that infringe on digital privacy laws. All services are performed on open sources, own devices or under written authorization of the interested party.‚Äù

us.section4_2_text: Personal and non-commercial use of the website content is permitted, as long as all copyright notices are maintained.
us.section5_1_text: We collect personal information only when necessary to provide our services. This information is handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
us.section5_2_text: The information collected is used exclusively for the purposes established in our Privacy Policy and is not shared with third parties without the consent of the user.
us.section6_text: CyberSecureAID reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately after their publication on this website.
